<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="Request issuance">ab2801bd1bbc9d507eefc912604bcb7c</cat_item><cat_variable/><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><messages/><name>Populate policy_id in request_issuance</name><order>20</order><script><![CDATA[function onLoad() {
	var g = new GlideURL();
    g.setFromCurrent(); 
	var policy_id = g.getParam("sysparm_policy")
	
	if (policy_id) {
        g_form.setValue('policy_id', policy_id);
    }
	
}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-07-20 15:08:49</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>cef151391bfc9d507eefc912604bcb5b</sys_id><sys_mod_count>3</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Populate policy_id in request_issuance</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="guardian" source="x_snc_guardian">137920841b2505107eefc912604bcb13</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="guardian">137920841b2505107eefc912604bcb13</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_cef151391bfc9d507eefc912604bcb5b</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-07-21 10:57:11</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onLoad</type><ui_type>0</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>
